comments: An infinite coprime sequence defined by recursion. - _Michael Somos_, Mar 14 2004Let u(k), v(k) be defined by u(1)=1, v(1)=3, u(k+1)=v(k)-u(k), v(k+1)=u(k)v(k); then a(n)=v(2n). - _Benoit Cloitre_, Apr 02 2002For positive n, a(n) has digital root 2 or 5 depending on whether n is odd or even. (T. Koshy) - _Lekraj Beedassy_, Apr 11 2005
